tracer.paths

Class Gesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • tracer.paths.Path
      • tracer.paths.Gesture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, Drawable

    public class Gesture
extends Path
    Like a Shape but with temporal information attached to each vertex. Ideal for creating paths out of mouse motions.
    Author:
    James Morrow [jamesmorrowdesign.com]

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Gesture.SpaceTimePoint
      A coordinate in space and in time.

                  float u)
        Description copied from class: Path
        Given a 1D coordinate, a float, maps the coordinate to a 2D coordinate and stores it in a given Point.

        Maps a given floating point number within [0, 1) to a given Point along the perimeter of the Path.

      • removeVertex

        public void removeVertex(float t)
        Looks for a vertex at time coordinate t and, if found, removes it. The method stops after removing the first vertex it finds or after iterating through the entire list of vertices and finding nothing.
        Parameters:
        t - The time coordinate

      • getGap

        public float getGap(int i)
        Description copied from class: Path
        Gives the ith discontinuity in the Path as a 1D coordinate. Gaps should be unique and indexed in ascending order. In other words, this must hold true: gap(i) < gap(i+1) as i varies from 0 to getGapCount()-1. Gives -1 if the index is valid.
        Specified by:
        getGap in class Path
        Parameters:
        i - The index
        Returns:
        The ith discontinuity as a value within [0, 1)
